issue.title: Audit of topics to ensure no cheating allowed

content.raw: @_jrivero_ added https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/pull/585 to disable most /gazebo topics and services which might be useful to you here. For ARIAC we needed a subset of them enabled (e.g.spawn_urdf_model, unpause physics), so we have [a custom branch of gazebo_ros_packages](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/commits/ariac-network-indigo) being built in our dockerfiles. from a comment above it sounds like you might have the same requirements for SRC
